verses.verse: Yes, may you (Ps. 134:3) see your children’s children. (Gen. 48:11; 50:23; Job 42:16; Ps. 103:17; (Prov. 17:6)) Peace be upon Israel!

Song of Victory over Zion’s Enemies Song of Ascents. [1] “Many a time they have (Ps. 125:5) afflicted me from ((Jer. 1:19; 15:20); Matt. 16:18; 2 Cor. 4:8, 9) my youth,” (Ezek. 23:3; Hos. 2:15) Let Israel now say—
“Many a time they have afflicted me from my youth; Yet they have not prevailed against me.
The plowers plowed on my back; They made their furrows long.”
The LORD is righteous; He has cut in pieces the cords of the wicked.
Let all those who hate Zion Be put to shame and turned back.
Let them be as the (Ps. 124:1) grass on the housetops, Which withers before it grows up,
With which the reaper does not fill his hand, Nor he who binds sheaves, his arms.
